Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: bni
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera we have ever owned.  Its great for everything and anything you want to take a picture of or video.  The quality is top knotch.

Reviews.Title: One question!!!
Reviews.Author: Juan G.
Reviews.Content: I wanna know if the camera and the adds are all new?Plz answer soon cause i wanna buy it!!
